content:
[basic explain]
近距离攻击时， 有1%%的几率使自身进入无敌状态3秒。 (在决斗场中无效)

[if]
    [attacker]
        `character`    -1
    [attack success]
        1
    [cooltime]
        3000
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [duration]
        3000
    [probability]
        1
    [reduce probability to human armor at pvp module]
        100
    [buff]
        `unbreakable`
[/then]
